pages.text: Occasionally, you may come across an Anomaly Dino. These dinosaurs have, theoretically, wandered too close to the Access Points. Due to the time warping around the portals, these dinos have been both rapidly evolved and devolved at the same time. Anomalies are very rare, yet not impossible to find in their original species' usual areas.

Anomaly Dinosaurs are larger, stronger, and usually faster than their natural counterparts. They're usually far more mindless and brave, and they may even cannibalize their own original species. They have exceptional senses; stay far away unless you're prepared.

However, it's not all bad. If you're prepared with the right gear, you might be able to take down one of these beasts and take your spoils home to make new weapons. You know, as a replacement for your pummeled ones.
